docs.lead_paragraph: The largest, longest study of teen obesity surgery shows huge weight loss and health gains can last at least three years, and many say it's worth the risks.

headline.main: Study: Teen Obesity Surgery Benefits Last at Least 3 Years
headline.print_headline: Study: Teen Obesity Surgery Benefits Last at Least 3 Years

docs.snippet: The largest, longest study of teen obesity surgery shows huge weight loss and health gains can last at least three years, and many say it's worth the risks.

docs.lead_paragraph: As the furor over soaring U.S. prescription drug prices escalates and outrageous price hikes by several smaller drugmakers give the entire industry a black eye, the biggest U.S.-based drugmaker is expanding financial assistance to patients.

headline.main: Pfizer Doubling Patient Income Limit for Free Drug Program
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Doubling Patient Income Limit for Free Drug Program

docs.snippet: As the furor over soaring U.S. prescription drug prices escalates and outrageous price hikes by several smaller drugmakers give the entire industry a black eye, the biggest U.S.-based drugmaker is expanding financial assistance to patients.

docs.lead_paragraph: When you're coming down with a cold, there are a few items you typically reach for to start feeling better: cough drops, herbal tea, maybe an over-the-counter medication.

headline.main: Virtual Doctor Visits Offer Convenience, Lower Costs
headline.print_headline: Virtual Doctor Visits Offer Convenience, Lower Costs

docs.snippet: When you're coming down with a cold, there are a few items you typically reach for to start feeling better: cough drops, herbal tea, maybe an over-the-counter medication.

docs.lead_paragraph: Turing Pharmaceuticals, which raised the price of the drug Daraprim fiftyfold overnight, said it would reduce the cost by around 10 percent and expand financial support to patients.

headline.main: Turing Commits to Modest Price Reduction on a Drug
headline.print_headline: Turing Commits to Modest Price Reduction on a Drug

docs.abstract: Turing Pharmaceuticals announces it will lower somewhat price of drug Daraprim by end of year, but does not indicate how much; company and its founder Martin Shkreli were roundly criticized for raising price of drug fiftyfold immediately after acquiring it.
docs.snippet: Turing Pharmaceuticals, which raised the price of the drug Daraprim fiftyfold overnight, said it would reduce the cost by around 10 percent and expand financial support to patients.

docs.lead_paragraph: An experimental mosquito-killer for livestock may help prevent the transmission of the disease to humans.

headline.main: To Prevent Malaria in Humans, Scientists Try Protecting Pigs
headline.print_headline: Livestock May Become Defense Against Malaria

docs.abstract: Scientists have begun initiative to give deworming medication containing ivermectin to livestock in places affected by mosquito-borne diseases including malaria and yellow fever and chiungunya virus; research shows mosquitoes die after drinking blood of medicated humans or animals.
docs.snippet: An experimental mosquito-killer for livestock may help prevent the transmission of the disease to humans.

docs.lead_paragraph: Improvise isn't a word parents want to hear from their kid's doctor. Yet pediatric specialists too often have to jury-rig care because many of the medical devices needed to treat sick children were built for adults.

headline.main: New Push for Pint-Sized Medical Devices to Treat Sick Kids
headline.print_headline: New Push for Pint-Sized Medical Devices to Treat Sick Kids
